task: Develop a basic 'Marble Madness' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'What wouldn't you do?'.
name: Marble Mayhem

branding_data.short_description: Navigate through chaotic courses in Marble Mayhem, where unexpected challenges await.
branding_data.detailed_description: Marble Mayhem takes the classic concept of navigating a marble through treacherous courses and flips it on its head with the oblique strategy: 'What wouldn't you do?'. Players must guide their marble through a series of increasingly unpredictable levels filled with mind-bending obstacles and traps. Unlike traditional marble games, Marble Mayhem introduces elements that players would typically avoid, such as reverse gravity, invisible paths, and deceptive routes that challenge conventional gameplay strategies. Each level presents a unique puzzle, requiring players to think outside the box and embrace chaos to reach the finish line.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
